title: Microsoft's stock surges up to 15-year high thanks to latest earnings report
text:
Microsoft's stock surges up to 15-year high thanks to latest earnings report 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
If you own any Microsoft stock, you were jubilant indeed today. The stock price for the Redmond, Washington company surged up over 10 percen...
